derivation: the same in form as H4901 (מֶשֶׁךְ), but probably of foreign derivation;
outline:
Mesech or Meshech = "drawing out"
  1. son of Japheth, grandson of Noah, and progenitor of peoples to the north of Israel
    1. descendants of Mesech often mentioned in connection with Tubal, Magog, and other northern nations including the Moschi, a people on the borders of Colchis and Armenia
strongs_def: Meshek, a son of Japheth, and the people descended from him
